00017 inline DC_Event::DC_Event() {
00018 }
00019 
00020 inline TD_ObsTime DC_Event::getTimeStamp() const {
00021         assert ( timeStamp >= 0 );
00022         return timeStamp;
00023 }
00024 
00025 inline TD_EventType DC_Event::getEventType() const {
00026         assert ( evtType > 0 );
00027         return evtType;
00028 }
00029 
00030 inline void DC_Event::setTimeStamp(TD_ObsTime timeStamp) {
00031         assert ( timeStamp >= 0 );
00032         this->timeStamp = timeStamp;
00033 }
00034 
00035 inline void DC_Event::setEventType(TD_EventType eventType) {
00036         assert ( eventType > 0 );
00037         evtType = eventType;
00038 }

00040 #endif
